topics.fancy_title: Webinar: Community Scaries: What to Worry About in Communities
topics.title: Webinar: Community Scaries: What to Worry About in Communities
topics.excerpt: While October might bring Halloween “scaries,” community managers know the real fright comes when your stats start spiking… or slumping. Join us 2025-10-28T15:00:00Z (UTC) to learn how to tell the difference between norm…

topics.fancy_title: New to Discourse? Start here!
topics.title: New to Discourse? Start here!
topics.excerpt:
:waving_hand: We’re so glad you’re here! This is our official community, where you can connect, ask questions, and share ideas about Discourse, a powerful platform for support, teamwork, and everything community. 
You’ll…
topics.ai_topic_gist: Discourse, an open-source discussion platform, offers various installation options and features a community discussion site, Meta, where users can find topics on features, bugs, hosting, development, and general support.

topics.fancy_title: Emails don’t get through always
topics.title: Emails don't get through always
topics.ai_topic_gist: User suggests contacting the forum admin to check email logs for rejection reasons, questioning the link-blocking policy for emails.

topics.fancy_title: How to logout user by api
topics.title: How to logout user by api

tags_descriptions.rest-api: Topics about making an external request to Discourse

topics.ai_topic_gist: User is trying to log out users via API but receives a webpage instead of a success message despite a 200 response code.

topics.fancy_title: Theme modifiers: A brief introduction
topics.title: Theme modifiers: A brief introduction
topics.ai_topic_gist: A typo in the documentation link for theme modifiers was identified and a pull request to fix it was submitted.

topics.fancy_title: I want to share plugin on github, do I have to add any license file? which one?
topics.title: I want to share plugin on github, do I have to add any license file? which one?
topics.ai_topic_gist: Discourse plugins should use GPL v2-compatible licenses like MIT, with a suggestion to consider GPL v3 for better compatibility.

topics.fancy_title: Discourse Category Headers theme component
topics.title: Discourse Category Headers theme component
topics.ai_topic_gist: A theme component for Discourse category headers is being updated to fix a text refresh issue and add expand/collapse functionality, with further improvements under consideration.

topics.fancy_title: Content Localization - Manual and Automatic with Discourse AI
topics.title: Content Localization - Manual and Automatic with Discourse AI
topics.ai_topic_gist: Users request locale setting for all users and manual translation composer image upload support, while category-specific localization remains unavailable.

topics.fancy_title: Users IP address is the same as reverse proxy
topics.title: Users IP address is the same as reverse proxy
topics.ai_topic_gist: A user resolved the issue of seeing only the proxy server's IP in Discourse by configuring the real client IP header and setting trusted proxies.

topics.fancy_title: Current Projects - October 2025
topics.title: Current Projects - October 2025
topics.ai_topic_gist: Discourse clarifies AI search opt-out options and European LLM compatibility, while discussing admin chat visibility and deprecating the search banner.

topics.fancy_title: How to Add Automatic Multilingual Translation Interface in Discourse?
topics.title: How to Add Automatic Multilingual Translation Interface in Discourse?
topics.ai_topic_gist: A user shared an image and another provided a link to a Discourse AI feature for automatic multilingual translation, addressing the initial query about implementing this functionality.

topics.fancy_title: Filter Favorites
topics.title: Filter Favorites
topics.ai_topic_gist: The Favorite Filters theme component allows users to save and customize filter shortcuts, with admins setting default filters and users personalizing their own.

topics.fancy_title: How We Built Horizon with Design Driven Development
topics.title: How We Built Horizon with Design Driven Development
topics.ai_topic_gist: A user praises the article for introducing the term “dogfooding,” sparking a discussion on its significance within the company.

topics.fancy_title: Occasionally very high CPU load
topics.title: Occasionally very high CPU load
topics.ai_topic_gist: GeorgSeifert is experiencing high CPU load and 502 errors, and the discussion focuses on the need for swap space despite increased RAM.

topics.fancy_title: How to Enable Terms of Service and Privacy Policy Pages in Discourse?
topics.title: How to Enable Terms of Service and Privacy Policy Pages in Discourse?
topics.ai_topic_gist: Turgut successfully enabled Terms of Service and Privacy Policy pages by setting the company name, and now inquires about creating a weekly newsletter page, possibly using the Page Publishing plugin.

topics.fancy_title: Does Discourse automatically remove unsupported html tag
topics.title: Does Discourse automatically remove unsupported html tag
topics.ai_topic_gist: Users are bypassing watchword filters by splitting words with HTML tags, and bots are creating new accounts or hacking existing ones to evade bans.

topics.fancy_title: Digest/Activity Summary emails not sending for users even though all conditions are met (Discourse 3.6)
topics.title: Digest/Activity Summary emails not sending for users even though all conditions are met (Discourse 3.6)
topics.ai_topic_gist: Users on Discourse 3.6 are not receiving digest emails despite meeting all conditions, and changing the frequency to daily temporarily resolved the issue for some users.

topics.fancy_title: Discourse AI - Sentiment
topics.title: Discourse AI - Sentiment

tags_descriptions.how-to: How to guides contain steps to follow to solve a specific problem

topics.ai_topic_gist: A user inquires about configuring the threshold score for sentiment classification in the Discourse AI plugin.

topics.fancy_title: Discourse failure to renew certificate
topics.title: Discourse failure to renew certificate
topics.ai_topic_gist: Users discuss certificate renewal issues in Discourse, noting that a command line rebuild triggers renewal, with one user confirming successful renewal after this process.

topics.fancy_title: Automate post creation on Discourse with multiple users
topics.title: Automate post creation on Discourse with multiple users
topics.ai_topic_gist: User inquires about using the Discourse API to automate daily posts with pre-scheduling, suggesting n8n as a potential solution.

topics.fancy_title: Text-Preview on Cards
topics.title: Text-Preview on Cards
topics.ai_topic_gist: A user is troubleshooting the missing text-preview feature on cards in kanban, and another user suggests checking a specific theme component setting.

topics.fancy_title: Mark as Unread - default set by admin?
topics.title: Mark as Unread - default set by admin?
topics.ai_topic_gist: The 'Mark as Unread' feature is clarified to reactivate notifications and reappear in the unread list, differing from bookmarking.

topics.fancy_title: Can’t include an auto-join group in an invite
topics.title: Can't include an auto-join group in an invite
topics.ai_topic_gist: The issue was resolved by reloading the site, and a suggestion was made to report the problem to improve the user experience.

topics.fancy_title: Unable to enable AI search results when there are no regular results
topics.title: Unable to enable AI search results when there are no regular results
topics.ai_topic_gist: Users discuss the confusion caused by the current AI search results enablement process and propose changes to improve usability.

topics.fancy_title: Links don’t work in placeholder forms
topics.title: Links don't work in placeholder forms

topics.fancy_title: Flags cannot be deleted immediately after creation
topics.title: Flags cannot be deleted immediately after creation

tags_descriptions.admin-sidebar: Topics about the new experimental admin sidebar

topics.ai_topic_gist: User reports inability to delete a newly created flag in a fresh sandbox instance using 3.6.0.beta2-latest, and seeks clarification on flags API configuration.

topics.fancy_title: Code highlights prevent the placeholder value from being displayed in a codeblock
topics.title: Code highlights prevent the placeholder value from being displayed in a codeblock
topics.ai_topic_gist: Code highlights prevent placeholder values from displaying in code blocks, but specifying 'txt' as the language works around the issue.

topics.fancy_title: S3 image bandwidth costs are getting annoying
topics.title: S3 image bandwidth costs are getting annoying
topics.ai_topic_gist: A user inquires about changes to settings for an S3 image service setup that has been working fine for six years.

topics.fancy_title: Dark/Light Mode Toggle delivers mixed results when OS settings do not match toggle settings
topics.title: Dark/Light Mode Toggle delivers mixed results when OS settings do not match toggle settings
topics.ai_topic_gist: User reports that CSS dark/light mode styles are ignored when OS settings and sidebar toggle settings do not match.

topics.fancy_title: Discourse BBCode Color
topics.title: Discourse BBCode Color

tags_descriptions.official: Themes, theme components, or plugins officially maintained by the Discourse team

topics.ai_topic_gist: Discussion revolves around the purpose and functionality of the Discourse BBCode Color plugin, with users seeking clarification on its differences from the Discourse BBCode plugin and suggesting potential feature additions, such as preset color selectors.
